feels.name: Irritation
feels.quote: Italy had quickened Cecil, not to tolerance, but to irritation. He saw that the local society was narrow, but, instead of saying, 'Does that very much matter?' he rebelled, and tried to substitute for it the society he called broad.

feels.name: Disgust
feels.quote: He hated the physical violence of the young. How right it was! Sure enough it ended in a cry.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: She was as scarlet as if he had put the thing most indelicately.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: For instance, Freddy. Freddy was neither clever, nor subtle, nor beautiful, and what prevented Cecil from saying, any minute, 'It would be wrong not to loathe Freddy'?

causedByEvent.name: Concern about Cecil's opinion of Freddy

feels.name: Uneasiness
feels.quote: I'm quite uneasy at being always right so often.
